Café Mystique

Refreshments while you play

Enjoy a selection of hot and cold beverages or snacks while you play. Our café is open during all business hours, so you can fuel up and keep the fun going!
From freshly brewed coffee to artisanal teas, and from light snacks to delicious pastries, we've got everything you need to make your gaming experience even more enjoyable.

Menu

Coffee

Experience our premium coffee selection, expertly crafted by our skilled baristas. From classic espresso to rich lattes, savor the perfect brew for your epic adventure.

  • Espresso $2.50
  • Americano $2.75
  • Latte $3.00
  • Mocha $3.25
  • Flat White $3.00
  • Cappuccino $3.00

Teas

Indulge in our carefully curated selection of aromatic teas. From classic English Breakfast to exotic herbal blends, find your perfect cup to accompany your gaming session.

  • English Breakfast $2.25
  • Green Tea $2.25
  • Iced Tea $2.50
  • Mint Tea $2.25
  • Mango Tea $2.50
  • Jasmine $2.25

Snacks

Satisfy your gaming cravings with our delectable selection of snacks and pastries. From sweet treats to savory bites, we offer the perfect fuel for your board game adventures.

  • Waffle $3.50
  • Croissant $2.50
  • Danish $2.75
  • Brownies $3.00
  • Cheesecake $3.75
  • Muffin $2.50
